note: Geographer #GIS #Geospatial #EO #climatechange #sustainability #gischat Fellow Royal Canadian Geographical Society Adjunct professor Consultant Aviation geek Eastern Canada🇨🇦 I do not seek to change beliefs, merely share and discover information for thought.

Lives in Cambridge, Massachusetts, USA. Interests include tech, science fiction, art, watching ice hockey (Boston Bruins), cooking, and following news from all over the world. I care about Sudan. I care about Ukraine. Bernie voter, now Harris. Terrible things can happen to us if Trump wins.
I wear a mask. Covid is airborne. #CambridgeMa #Tech #ScienceFiction #BostonBruins #NHLBruins #Cooking #Art
